title: A basic deranged killer feature
review:
Nothing is missing, and nothing is particularly special.
The redeeming feature of this movie is it's appropriate run time of 71 minutes, in the ago of overlong, dull "thrillers".

title: alright
review: Nothing spectacular about the movie though the actors all played their part well.....simple storyline but the ending made me rate it a bit less, there were so many endings that I liked honestly that could have happened but it is what it is and I gave it a 5/10......watch at your own convenience...

title: Last 15min. Left The Movie Took A Deep Plunge
review: For a low budget movie I was impressed with the writing, cinematography; the actors timing was off a smidge. Was ready to give high kudos/rating but the last 15min. ruined everything!
